actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the North Cascades National Park and in the Ross Lake and Lake Chelan National Recreation Areas, Wash., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the North Cascades National Park and in the Ross Lake and Lake Chelan National Recreation Areas in Washington as Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the North Cascades National Park and in the Ross Lake and Lake Chelan National Recreation Areas, Wash., as wilderness.
